body:
As an avid user of the [asdf](https://github.com/asdf-vm/asdf) tool, this appears to be the only missing dependency. I had to write it for myself, but I figured it would be a good candidate to submit back here!

Let me know if there's anything I can change to better align with styles and whatnot. I've never really worked with Python before. What I have is a best guess based on documentation and looking at a couple of sample packages.
title: Added libyaml package
